custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM OAuthApplications_Users

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM OAuthApplications_Users, OAuthApplication WHERE (OAuthApplication.ownerId = ?) AND (OAuthApplication.applicationId = OAuthApplications_Users.applicationId) AND (OAuthApplications_Users.authorized = ?)

SELECT {OAuthApplications_Users.*} FROM OAuthApplications_Users, OAuthApplication WHERE (OAuthApplication.ownerId = ?) AND (OAuthApplication.applicationId = OAuthApplications_Users.applicationId) AND (OAuthApplications_Users.authorized = ?)
